translations: n.禁运，贸易禁运；禁令；封港令
v.禁止……的贸易，禁运；下令封锁（消息），禁止出版；<旧>征用（船只，货物）

sentences.sentence: The embargo would only hurt innocent civilians.
sentences.translation: 禁运反而会伤及无辜的平民。

sentences.sentence: The United Nations imposed an arms embargo against the country.
sentences.translation: 联合国对该国施行了武器贸易禁运。

sentences.sentence: The ship was impounded under the terms of the UN trade embargo.
sentences.translation: 那条船因联合国贸易禁令而遭扣押。
